评论详情: Super cute, fit as expected, soft, good quality!
Too cute. True to size. Material. Soft comfortable. Medium thickness nice
So cute and I love the material! It’s not fuzzy warm but it is warm for toddler! It’s thin too so it’s not so bulky! I need more! It’s soft and fits true to size I got a 24m. I love it!
The only reason I have this four stars is because it is a little thin and the inside is a little scratchy.
The outfit is adorable! It is true to size! Not as think of a material as I was anticipating but still very good quality! I got it on sale so it is great price what I paid for it!
Loved the fabric and fit of this on my 7 month old. She looks so cute in it as well. Easy to get on and off. Color was spot on
I love this outfit.  Super cute, nice material.
bought as a christmas present, so adorable! worth the money as well as the fabric is great!
Love it fit perfectly fine with a soft touch
Outfit fits perfectly.  And it is as appeared.  Thank you.
Such a cute gift for mom & baby
This little outfit is very cute and comfy on my great granddaughter and she looks adorable in it.  Quality material also
Fits my great grand baby well
I like the outfit for my granddaughter, but the words on the top are a decal, not embroidered. It looks a little cheap. I would probably not have bought this if this was clear in the description.
Perfect gift to start the fall months. Cute outfit
I did not like that it did not have tags on the mice the other outfit fun and it has karkd in them.

I purchased this off of someone’s baby registry. The first outfit arrived and was missing the punctuation completely to the point that it looks like a stain on the shirt. I requested a new one it came promptly and the new one is also losing its punctuation! Super discouraging definitely having the family take this off the registry completely!
This outfit had a very bad smell.

My baby is 20 months old and this is still a bit too big for her. But the outfit is lovely! so well made. The fabric is super lightweight tho, so if you were expecting a thicker fabric for cold weather, this one is not it!

I sent this to my son and daughter in law that are expecting my 1st grand baby in December 2024. The outfit looks like the photos, says what it shows. Description and size seems fitting. We won't know how well it fits until after lil bean arrives and growing. This is an adorable little outfit!

This set is so cozy and stretchy. The pants have amazing elastic in them and they are really easy to get on and off of my baby. The top fits really well. It has a bit of space in it for her to grow. The whole design is absolutely adorable. The wording is bold and well done so it is easy to make out. The cheetah print is so cute!!! For this price, I'm getting 2.
such good quality. sturdy. great material. you won't be disappointed. Fits true to size.  well worth it
This outfit is so cute! I needed some warmer outfits for my little girl and this one is a must! It fits perfectly and keeps her warm.
